title: China : weekly box office revenue November 2019 , by movie
yAxis: Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Hollywood Films in the x axis and Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Hollywood Films Frozen 2 and lowest at Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest.
The highest Hollywood Films Frozen 2 has 35.8 more Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Hollywood Films in the x axis and Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars 37.3 is found at Hollywood Films Frozen 2 and the minimum is found at Wings Over Everest where Hollywood Films is 1.5.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Hollywood Films in the x axis and Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Hollywood Films Frozen 2 and lowest at Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest.
The highest Hollywood Films Frozen 2 has 35.8 more Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Hollywood Filmss.
The Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Hollywood Films Frozen 2 and lowest at Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest.
Hollywood Films Two Tigers has the second highest value for Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Hollywood Films Frozen 2 has 35.8 more Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest.
Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars at Hollywood Films Frozen 2 is 37.3 , second place is Two Tigers at 19.6, and thirdly is Knives Out at 13.5.
The highest value 37.3 at Frozen 2 is almost 4.03 times larger than the average value 9.25.
The Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars is 92.5 if we add up values of all Hollywood Filmss.
